mapper.select: SELECT NICKNAME, COUNT FROM ( SELECT NICKNAME, COUNT(*) COUNT FROM TB_TODO JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(MEMBER_ID) WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM STARTED_AT) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) GROUP BY NICKNAME ORDER BY 2 DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3

SELECT RANK, COUNT FROM ( SELECT NICKNAME, COUNT, ROWNUM RANK FROM ( SELECT NICKNAME, COUNT(*) COUNT FROM TB_TODO JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(MEMBER_ID) WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM STARTED_AT) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) GROUP BY NICKNAME ORDER BY 2 DESC ) ) JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(NICKNAME) WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT M.NAME, M.CALORIE FROM TB_MENU M JOIN TB_MENU_DETAIL MD USING (MENU_ID) JOIN TB_DAILY_MENU DM USING (DAILY_MENU_ID) JOIN TB_TODO T USING (TODO_ID) WHERE T.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND DM.DAY_NO = MOD(TRUNC(SYSDATE - STARTED_AT), T.DAY_REPEAT) + 1

SELECT E.NAME, E.MET FROM TB_EXERCISE E JOIN TB_EXERCISE_DETAIL ED USING (EXERCISE_ID) JOIN TB_DAILY_EXERCISE DE USING (DAILY_EXERCISE_ID) JOIN TB_TODO T USING (TODO_ID) WHERE T.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND DE.DAY_NO = MOD(TRUNC(SYSDATE - STARTED_AT), T.DAY_REPEAT) + 1
SELECT TODO_ID, CATEGORY, STARTED_AT, ENDED_AT FROM TB_TODO WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND CATEGORY='MENU'
SELECT TODO_ID, CATEGORY, STARTED_AT, ENDED_AT FROM TB_TODO WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND CATEGORY='EXERCISE'
mapper.delete: DELETE TB_TODO WHERE TODO_ID = #{todoId} AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
